hadiths.text: Abu Huraira (Allah be pleased with him) reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:An Umra is an expiation for the sins committed between it and the next, and Hajj which is accepted will receive no other reward than Paradise

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي فَضْلِ الْحَجِّ وَالْعُمْرَةِ وَيَوْمِ عَرَفَةَ
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of the day of 'Arafat
